data.persona: Flap flap flap. Worm! ANOTHER BIRD! Time to poop.
data.description:
You are in the Old Queen Farm.
Once a fairly profitable farm, the Old Queen Farm is now a deteriorated old shack surrounded by uninhabitable fields with soil incapable of growing even weeds. The farm house shows signs that is being occupied by wild animals, and the roof is beginning to cave inwards.
The rat is here.

You are carrying a worm.

data.short_motivation: I want all the worms for myself.
data.mid_motivation: I want to eventually get rid of all the rats so they will stop trying to eat all my worms.
data.long_motivation: I want to find a new farm with lots of food for me to eat and no competition.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the Old Queen farm to look for worms.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the rat who seems to know where all the worms are.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal a worm from the rat's mouth.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the next room to avoid the rat's revenge.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: drink water from a nearby drain, while making sure the rat didn't follow me.
